name: Odd Eve - The Hand Cricket
description:
From our memories of our school life, Akshat and Dharmeshwar wanted to relive those times where the group of friends played this "ODD-EVE" game. Choosing from 1 to 6 for batting and fielding gives a little twist to those who never played this. Basic cricket rules are followed, How to play section may help you with this.

Enjoy the game with Kapil Dev narrating / commentating right from the stadium screen . 

After only starting of Python language, we challenged ourselves to create a game and since it was the beginning, here is a so called game as our first project.
